
{{Client function}}

{{New feature/item|3.0150|1.5.0|7048|
This function returns the radius for a [[/Element/Light.md|light]] element.
}}

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
float getLightRadius ( light theLight )
</syntaxhighlight>
{{OOP||[[/light.md|light]]:getRadius|radius|setLightRadius}}

===Required Arguments=== 
*'''theLight:''' The [[/Element/Light.md|light]] that you wish to retrieve the radius of.

=== Returns ===
Returns a [[/float.md|float]] containing the radius of the specified light, ''false'' if invalid arguments were passed.

===Example===
<syntaxhighlight lang="Lua">
local light = createLight(0, 0, 0, 4)
outputChatBox("light radius: " .. getLightRadius(light))
</syntaxhighlight>
